title: Learning Analytics-Based Computing Education Improvement Strategy Design

context.prior_knowledge: Proficiency in Programming Fundamentals and Project Management Experience
context.additional_context: Goal of acquiring learning data analysis skills and enhancing instructional design capabilities based on experience with version control systems (Git)

learning_goals: Learners can identify at least three learning behavior patterns in the project process using the learning analytics tool (Polivr).
Learners can interpret student data visualization results and establish personalized feedback strategies.
Learners can design a method to predict the timing of learning gaps based on version control system data.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
